word_mean_info__list.difference: 从本义垃圾引申而指毫无价值的话或思想。
指因愚蠢或无知而出现的一切荒唐和无意义的言语。

word_group.brief_definition: 愚蠢的胡言；可笑的胡言乱语
容忍胡说八道；容忍无稽之谈
落后阶层的废话；下层阶级的废话

bilingual.source: Don't listen to his nonsense, he's just joking.
bilingual.target: 别听他胡说，他只是开玩笑。

bilingual.source: Talking nonsense like this will only make things worse.
bilingual.target: 你这样胡说只会让事情变得更糟。

bilingual.source: Children sometimes talk nonsense, but they mean no harm.
bilingual.target: 小孩子有时候会胡说，但他们并无恶意。
这些谣言都是胡说八道。
他说的那些话简直是胡说八道。
你不能相信所有的胡说八道。

bilingual.source: Don't listen to him; he's talking nonsense.
bilingual.target: 别听他的，他在胡说八道。

bilingual.source: I can't take any more of this nonsense, basta!
bilingual.target: 我再也受不了这些胡说八道了，够了！

bilingual.source: "Bah! This is nonsense," she said with a frown.
bilingual.target: “呸！这简直是胡说八道，”她皱着眉头说。

bilingual.source: What you're saying is pure nonsense and has no basis.
bilingual.target: 你说的简直是胡说八道，没有任何根据。

yingyinNormal.en: Nonsense. You must stay with us.
yingyinNormal.zh: 别胡说，你得住我们这儿。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, that's nonsense. You name one little change I was upset with.
yingyinNormal.zh: 胡说。举个我对小改变不开心的例子。

yingyinNormal.en: But we can't drive in the river. Yes, it's talking nonsense.
yingyinNormal.zh: 但是我们不能开进河里呀。没错，这根本就是在胡说。

yingyinNormal.en: But Daddy, you can hardly run at all. Nonsense. I am an expert at running.
yingyinNormal.zh: 但是爸爸，你根本就跑不动，不是吗。别胡说！我可是很擅长跑步的！

yingyinNormal.en: I have to work early. Nonsense. There's so much to talk about. It's just for a drink or two.
yingyinNormal.zh: 明天我还得早起上班呢。胡说还有好多话没说。就去喝几杯而已。

yingyinNormal.en: Glad to, but he won't want me there. Nonsense. You have far more in common with him than I do.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我很乐意，但他不会乐意见到我。胡说，你跟他的共同点比我多。

yingyinNormal.en: Silly daddy, your tummy is too big. Nonsense. I won trophies for my diving when I was younger.
yingyinNormal.zh: 爸爸，你就别闹了，你实在是太胖了。胡说！我年轻时还拿过跳水奖牌。

yingyinNormal.en: Suzy is talking nonsense. No, I'm not. She said, in the olden days, I was a baby. Well, you were, Peppa.
yingyinNormal.zh: 苏西在胡说。我没有。她说，在以前的时候，我是一个宝宝。你是的，佩奇。

yingyinNormal.en: Nonsense. He can fight his own battles. Colonel, he was obviously being bullied and he defended himself.
yingyinNormal.zh: 胡说，他能打赢他自己的战斗，上校，很显然他被欺负了，他只是在正当防卫，孩子。

yingyinNormal.en: Grandpa Pig, I don't think we have enough room. Nonsense. You've got plenty of room. Yes. I suppose so.
yingyinNormal.zh: 哦，猪爷爷，我想我们没有多余的地方了。不要胡说了!你们这里还有很多空地呢。额，的确是有的!

yingyinNormal.en: Daddy Pig, you are much too heavy for that branch! Nonsense! I know exactly how heavy I am. There! Hurray!
yingyinNormal.zh: 不行，猪爸爸，你太重了，那根撑不住的。你这是在胡说，我知道我自己究竟有多重，够到了。好嘞。

yingyinNormal.en: The trouble isn't with me, Penny, it's with your gender. Someday, scientists will discover that second X chromosome contains nothing but nonsense and twaddle.
yingyinNormal.zh: 问题不在我这，佩妮，而在你们女人身上，总有一天，科学家们会发现女性的第二条X染色体除了胡说和废话之外，其他一无所有。

yingyinNormal.en: Stuff and nonsense. You were attacked by an evil, violent man. There is no sin in that.
yingyinNormal.zh: 胡说八道，你被一个邪恶暴力的男人侵犯了，你没有任何过错

yingyinNormal.en: Nonsense, we haven't finished our drinks.
yingyinNormal.zh: 为何，我们还没喝完呢。

yingyinNormal.en: Nonsense! I trust the lady. We're leaving.
yingyinNormal.zh: 胡扯，我相信这位夫人，我们走吧。

yingyinNormal.en: Are you calling my life's work nonsense, Murph?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你是说我一生的努力都是无意义的吗，Murph？

yingyinNormal.en: Why? What happened? Typical bureaucratic nonsense.
yingyinNormal.zh: 为什么？出什么事了？典型的狗屁官僚主义。

yingyinNormal.en: Nonsense, let him observe. He'd learn a thing or two.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不用了，让他待着，说不定能学到点什么。

yingyinNormal.en: Nonsense! Why would Snape put a curse on Harry's broom?
yingyinNormal.zh: 尽胡扯，斯内普干嘛给哈利的扫帚念咒。

yingyinNormal.en: Superstitious nonsense, of course, but one can see their point.
yingyinNormal.zh: 当然是迷信而无道理的，但某人可以明白他们的用意。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: There is a great deal of this kind of <highlight>nonsense</highlight> in the medical journals which generates health scares.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 医学杂志上有大量这类无稽之谈，引发人们健康恐慌。
语言学家认为这是无稽之谈。

examination_example.sentence: As a linguist once said, "You can get people to think it's <highlight>nonsense</highlight> at the same time that you buy into it."
examination_example.sentence_trans: 正如一位语言学家曾经说过的，“你可以让人们在相信它的同时认为它是胡说。”
